snippet: In her memoir “Hard Choices,” Hillary Rodham Clinton weaves personal and political tales, according to CBS News, which obtained a copy before the book’s scheduled publication next week.
abstract: CBS News says Hillary Rodham Clinton, in her new memoir Hard Choices, weaves personal and political tales about her time as secretary of state; rollout of book has been carefully orchestrated with lineup of interviews and book tour.
lead_paragraph: In her memoir “Hard Choices,” Hillary Rodham Clinton weaves personal and political tales, according to CBS News, which obtained a copy before the book’s scheduled publication next week.

headline.main: In Memoir, Hillary Clinton Discusses Russia, Syria and Iraq
headline.print_headline: Clinton Book Mixes Tales Both Political and Personal
